snippet.title: Internet Explorer opens, flashes, and then closes ...‎
snippet.description: You may notice that Internet Explorer opens, flashes, and immediately closes when you start Internet Explorer 7, Internet Explorer 8, Internet Explorer 9 ...

snippet.description: ... I think it would be a self reflex ... problem with Windows Media Center When I opened Windows Media Center it would go to a black screen and the cursor would blink.
